name: UP926988: Death From Below
description:
Tap as fast as you can to escape the darkness below. It increases its speed over time so you better click fast! Try and last as long as possible to beat your high score. 

Soundtrack: Royalty free - 'Unknown Territories' Composer: Stephen Graf, sourced from https://www.freesoundtrackmusic.com/

Sprites, animations and textures all created for the game by Victoria Primmer
